title: A Day to Say Thank You
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Is everyone ready?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Completely~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Honoka-chan, you forgot your hair clip, nya.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>The ribbon on your outfit came loose.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ah, Ruby will fix that for you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>There’s the hair clip...... Alright, there. That’s cute.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Sorry, our Honoka is like that. She’s definitely not completely ready......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ahaha...... But I’m completely ready mentally! Seriously! I’ve been thinking about how to thank our supportive fans for the past week!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, I’m looking forward to it. Alright, this time, everyone’s ready. ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Let’s go, nya~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
